item.description:
An event for Minilympic teams only. Please do not RSVP unless you are registered in the Minilympics roster.

This event will be an elimination style tournament. Each round, player(s) with the lowest score will be eliminated until we have a winner or winners.

This event is worth 30 points for 1st place and 15 points for 2nd place. All teams will receive 5 points for participating.
.

 

The Game: If you have the hand/eye coordination of a video gamer, come on down to the Salem Willows Arcade for our Air Hockey event.  Lightning reflexes and an eye for angles is your key to success.  This game gained popularity in this group after an influx of new members during the 2011 summer season.

Important Note: The cost of the game will be covered by me.  Contestants will not need to pay to use the Salem Willows Air Hockey tables.

Tournament will run from 6pm to 10pm for 8 players.  If you wish to participate as a spectator, please say so in the comments and we will have room on a first come, first serve basis for 8 people.

 

*** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** ***
Did you know? (A Tribute to Gaming around the World):

The first real board game native to the United States of America, was produced in 1843 and called "The Mansion of Happiness".  The goal of the game was to collect virtues and avoid sins such as Passion, Idleness, Cruelty, Immodesty, Ingratitude and Public Drunkenness.
*** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** ***

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Minilympics: Reflex Event: Air Hockey
